entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Swan River
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:34 AM CST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -6.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Swan River 11:00 AM CST Sunday 22 January 2023
Temperature: -6.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.6 kPa falling
Humidity: 88 %
Wind Chill: -13
Dewpoint: -8.3°C
Wind: WSW 16 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: Freezing rain or snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Freezing rain beginning near noon then changing to flurries this afternoon. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 14 this morning and minus 9 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming northwest 20 this evening. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 9 this evening. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 11. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 11. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Sunday 22 January 2023
